name: Goblin Fever
description:
Game made for Three Thing Game Jam November 2020 by Kodebolds.

"Dark",  "Jack-O-Lantern", "Goblin" and an extra word "Social-Distancing".

Collect all of the Haemogoblins whilst stumbling around a dark and creepy maze. Watch out for those infected goblins, though. Please follow social distancing guidelines - you don't want to catch anything.... Collect and wear a facemask to temporarily stop the infection rate from rising, and effecting your health. Collect candles to increase the intensity of your pumpkin.
